fields.Title of Presentation: "The Radziwill Women of the 18th Century and their Management of the Family Fortune"
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Third Congress of International Researchers of Polish History
fields.Description/Abstract:
This research examine's women's contribution to the Radziwill family income via the founding of industries and leasing of family lands in creative and new forms of land tenure.  The Radziwill family fortune in the 18th century was huge.  Estimates put it at 130-150 million zloty annually, making them one of the most wealthy families of central Europe in the 18th century, and their fortune was increased by energetic and accomplished representatives of the family.  In the Radziwill family, those energetic and accomplished individuals happened to be women.  This paper examines the contribution of women to the accumulation of the Radziwill family fortune.
(This paper was read in absentia because I was not able to go to the conference.
